subject: Pedal models
description_text:
Hi
What is the difference between the 
Simsonn Pro X pedals 
And 
“Newest” Simsonn pro x pedals

There is a significant price difference
Thanks,
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Zach J,  Currently, we only offer the ProX Ultra version. The price differences you are seeing are likely due to bundles that include a base plate or a vibration motor kit, which affect the overall price.
